title: Tvvo treatises and an appendix to them concerning infant-baptisme. The former treatise being an exercitation presented to the chair-man of a committee of the Assembly of Divines. The later an examen of the sermon of Mr Stephen Marshall, about infant-baptisme, in a letter sent to him. / By John Tombes. B.D.
author: Tombes, John, 1603?-1676.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for George Whittington, and are to be sold at the signe of the Blackmore in Bishopsgate-streete.,
